title: Please help ID This font.
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503110224im_/http:/typophile.com/files/stories_6160.gif)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503110224im_/http:/typophile.com/files/resources_3930.gif)

I’ve tried Identifont and a few other font identifiers. I was hoping some of you could help.

Thanks!
author: tsukirei

comments.content: I know not, but if you’d like something a tad more formal: [Bodoni Egyptian](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503110224/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/shinntype/bodoni_egyptian/&sample_text=Stories%20from%20the%20field.%20Resources&sample_size=32).
Thank you. I might be able to make that one work. :)
